DBINFO.SQL: declare @pnr varchar(12),@pid int,@cid int,@cot int set @pnr='$PNUMBER$' set @pid=(select person_id from patient where ssn=@pnr) set @cid=(select clinic_id from patient where ssn=@pnr) set @cot=(select top 1 courseoftreatment_id from courseoftreatment where person_id=@pid and clinic_id=@cid and enddate is null order by courseoftreatment_id desc) create table #stat ( StatusCode int, StatusSubCode int, StatusParam int, SurfaceCarries char, DistalFilling smallint, BuckalFilling smallint, MesialFilling smallint, LingualFilling smallint, PalatinalFilling smallint, OcklusalFilling smallint, IncisalFilling smallint, Tooth varchar(2), Type varchar(3), Carries varchar(2)) insert into #stat select dtil.Code, dtil.SubCode, dtil.Param, case when dtil.Code in (101,102) then case when dtil.SubCode = 0 then 'D' when dtil.SubCode = 1 then 'B' when dtil.SubCode = 2 then 'M' when dtil.SubCode = 3 then 'L' when dtil.SubCode = 4 then 'P' when dtil.SubCode = 5 then 'O' else '' end else '' end, case when exists (select Code from DentalTreatmentCode where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode_ID=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%distal%') then 1 when exists (select Code from Surface where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%distal%') then 1 else 0 end, case when exists (select Code from DentalTreatmentCode where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode_ID=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%buckal%') then 1 when exists (select Code from Surface where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%buckal%') then 1 else 0 end, case when exists (select Code from DentalTreatmentCode where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode_ID=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%mesial%') then 1 when exists (select Code from Surface where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%mesial%') then 1 else 0 end, case when exists (select Code from DentalTreatmentCode where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode_ID=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%lingual%') then 1 when exists (select Code from Surface where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%lingual%') then 1 else 0 end, case when exists (select Code from DentalTreatmentCode where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode_ID=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%palatinal%') then 1 when exists (select Code from Surface where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%palatinal%') then 1 else 0 end, case when exists (select Code from DentalTreatmentCode where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode_ID=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%ocklusal%') then 1 when exists (select Code from Surface where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%ocklusal%') then 1 else 0 end, case when exists (select Code from DentalTreatmentCode where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode_ID=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%incisal%') then 1 when exists (select Code from Surface where Code=dtil.Code and SubCode=dtil.SubCode and Description like '%incisal%') then 1 else 0 end, case when dtil.Teeth1_16 > 0 then case when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 1) > 0 then '18' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 2) > 0 then '17' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 4) > 0 then '16' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 8) > 0 then '15' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 16) > 0 then '14' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 32) > 0 then '13' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 64) > 0 then '12' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 128) > 0 then '11' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 256) > 0 then '21' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 512) > 0 then '22' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 1024) > 0 then '23' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 2048) > 0 then '24' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 4096) > 0 then '25' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 8192) > 0 then '26' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 16384) > 0 then '27' when (dtil.Teeth1_16 & 32768) > 0 then '28' else '' end when dtil.Teeth17_32 > 0 then case when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 1) > 0 then '38' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 2) > 0 then '37' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 4) > 0 then '36' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 8) > 0 then '35' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 16) > 0 then '34' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 32) > 0 then '33' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 64) > 0 then '32' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 128) > 0 then '31' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 256) > 0 then '41' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 512) > 0 then '42' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 1024) > 0 then '43' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 2048) > 0 then '44' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 4096) > 0 then '45' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 8192) > 0 then '46' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 16384) > 0 then '47' when (dtil.Teeth17_32 & 32768) > 0 then '48' else '' end when dtil.Teeth33_48 > 0 then case when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 1) > 0 then '58' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 2) > 0 then '57' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 4) > 0 then '56' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 8) > 0 then '55' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 16) > 0 then '54' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 32) > 0 then '53' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 64) > 0 then '52' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 128) > 0 then '51' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 256) > 0 then '61' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 512) > 0 then '62' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 1024) > 0 then '63' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 2048) > 0 then '64' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 4096) > 0 then '65' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 8192) > 0 then '66' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 16384) > 0 then '67' when (dtil.Teeth33_48 & 32768) > 0 then '68' else '' end when dtil.Teeth49_64 > 0 then case when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 1) > 0 then '78' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 2) > 0 then '77' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 4) > 0 then '76' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 8) > 0 then '75' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 16) > 0 then '74' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 32) > 0 then '73' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 64) > 0 then '72' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 128) > 0 then '71' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 256) > 0 then '81' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 512) > 0 then '82' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 1024) > 0 then '83' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 2048) > 0 then '84' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 4096) > 0 then '85' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 8192) > 0 then '86' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 16384) > 0 then '87' when (dtil.Teeth49_64 & 32768) > 0 then '88' else '' end else '' end, case when dtil.isBaseline = 1 then 'S/D' else 'Åtg' end, case when dtil.Code = 102 then case when dtil.Param = 1 then 'D1' when dtil.Param = 2 then 'D2' when dtil.Param = 3 then 'D3' when dtil.Param = 4 then 'S' when dtil.Param = 5 then 'D' else '' end else '' end from DentitionTreatmentItemList dtil,Dentition d where d.Person_ID=@pid and d.Clinic_ID=@cid and d.dentition_id=dtil.dentition_id and dtil.isCancelled=0 and (d.courseoftreatment_id=@cot or dtil.code not in (101,102)) order by dtil.RecordedDate,dtil.DentitionList_id select * from (select (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='B' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'prim_ds-b', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries in ('L','P') and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'prim_ds-l', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='O' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'prim_ds-o', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='M' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'prim_ds-m', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='D' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'prim_ds-d', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where BuckalFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries = '') as ax1) as 'prim_fs-b', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where (LingualFilling=1 or PalatinalFilling=1) and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries = '') as ax2) as 'prim_fs-l', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where OcklusalFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries = '') as ax3) as 'prim_fs-o', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where MesialFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries = '') as ax4) as 'prim_fs-m', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where DistalFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries = '') as ax5) as 'prim_fs-d', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as xx1) as 'prim_dt', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries = '' and StatusCode in (9001,9002,9003,9010,9012,9020,9022,9024,9026,25001,25002,25010,31080,31081,31082,31090,31091,31092,90001,90015,90016,90017,90018,90019)) as xx2) as 'prim_et', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries = '' and (DistalFilling=1 or BuckalFilling=1 or MesialFilling=1 or LingualFilling=1 or PalatinalFilling=1 or OcklusalFilling=1)) as xx3) as 'prim_ft', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and (Carries in ('D3','D') or (Carries = '' and StatusCode in (9001,9002,9003,9010,9012,9020,9022,9024,9026,25001,25002,25010,31080,31081,31082,31090,31091,31092,90001,90015,90016,90017,90018,90019)) or (Carries = '' and (DistalFilling=1 or BuckalFilling=1 or MesialFilling=1 or LingualFilling=1 or PalatinalFilling=1 or OcklusalFilling=1)))) as xx4) as 'prim_deft', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='B' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'Perm_Ds-b', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries in ('L','P') and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'Perm_Ds-l', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='O' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'Perm_Ds-o', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='M' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'Perm_Ds-m', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='D' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as 'Perm_Ds-d', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where BuckalFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries = '') as bx1) as 'Perm_Fs-b', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where (LingualFilling=1 or PalatinalFilling=1) and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries = '') as bx2) as 'Perm_Fs-l', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where OcklusalFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries = '') as bx3) as 'Perm_Fs-o', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where MesialFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries = '') as bx4) as 'Perm_Fs-m', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where DistalFilling=1 and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries = '') as bx5) as 'Perm_Fs-d', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D3','D')) as xx5) as 'Perm_DT', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries = '' and StatusCode in (9001,9002,9003,9010,9012,9020,9022,9024,9026,25001,25002,25010,31080,31081,31082,31090,31091,31092,90001,90015,90016,90017,90018,90019)) as xx6) as 'Perm_ET', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries = '' and (DistalFilling=1 or BuckalFilling=1 or MesialFilling=1 or LingualFilling=1 or PalatinalFilling=1 or OcklusalFilling=1)) as xx7) as 'Perm_FT', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and (Carries in ('D3','D') or (Carries = '' and StatusCode in (9001,9002,9003,9010,9012,9020,9022,9024,9026,25001,25002,25010,31080,31081,31082,31090,31091,31092,90001,90015,90016,90017,90018,90019)) or (Carries = '' and (DistalFilling=1 or BuckalFilling=1 or MesialFilling=1 or LingualFilling=1 or PalatinalFilling=1 or OcklusalFilling=1)))) as xx8) as 'Perm_DEFT', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='B' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'prim_dis-b', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries in ('L','P') and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'prim_dis-l', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='O' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'prim_dis-o', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='M' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'prim_dis-m', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='D' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'prim_dis-d', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('5','6','7','8') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as xx9) as 'prim_dit', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='B' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'Perm_Dis-b', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries in ('L','P') and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'Perm_Dis-l', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='O' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'Perm_Dis-o', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='M' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'Perm_Dis-m', (select count(*) from #stat where SurfaceCarries='D' and substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as 'Perm_Dis-d', (select count(*) from (select distinct Tooth from #stat where substring(Tooth,1,1) in ('1','2','3','4') and Carries in ('D1','D2')) as xxA) as 'Perm_DiT') as innerselect drop table #stat
